data.question: What is the empirical formula of the potassium salt of oxadiazole-2-thione?
What type of geometry does the Cu(II) complex adopt around the metal center?
Which complex showed superior cytotoxicity against MDA-MB-231 human breast cancer cells?
True or False: The ligand Kpot路H2O was found to be more potent in scavenging hydroxyl radicals at a higher concentration than both complexes.
What method was used to assess the viability, proliferation, and cytotoxicity of the compounds against cancer cells?
Which assay was performed to investigate the DNA protective activity of the ligand and its complexes?
True or False: The Zn(II) complex is diamagnetic.
What was the purpose of using DAPI fluorescent dye in the study?
data.answer: To assess the effect of the compounds on cellular integrity and nuclear morphology

data.question: True or False: The wound healing assay revealed that the ligand and its complexes promoted the migration of MDA-MB-231 cells.
What was the result of treating MDA-MB-231 cells with Kpot路H2O and its complexes in terms of Caspase-3 activity?
data.answer: They induced a rapid increase in the expression level of Caspase-3

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of the potassium salt of oxadiazole-2-thione involved the use of CS2 and KOH.
What was the main goal of the study involving the potassium salt of oxadiazole-2-thione and its Cu(II) and Zn(II) complexes?
data.answer: To explore their anticancerous activity against MDA-MB-231 human breast carcinoma cells

data.question: True or False: The study found that the ligand Kpot路H2O and its complexes did not show any anticancer activity.
Which complex was found to be more potent at a lower concentration in scavenging hydroxyl radicals according to the DNA nicking assay?
What was the role of ethylenediamine in the synthesis of the Cu(II) and Zn(II) complexes?
data.answer: It was used as a secondary ligand

data.question: True or False: The study demonstrated that changing the reaction medium from mildly acidic to basic could change the geometry around the metal center.
What was the impact of the compounds on the migration ability of MDA-MB-231 cells as revealed by the wound healing assay?
data.answer: The compounds attenuated the migration of the cells

data.question: True or False: The study concluded that the ligand and its complexes have no potential for use in treating breast cancer.
What was the significance of the Caspase-3 activity assay in the context of the study?
data.answer: To determine the involvement of Caspase-3 in inducing apoptosis in MDA-MB-231 cells by the compounds
